thag1.14:0.4_0: We used to touch with our grinds.
thag1.14:1.3_0: My body lives in the village,
thag1.14:1.4_0: but my mind has gone to the wilderness.
thag1.14:1.5_0: I go there even when lying down—
thag1.14:1.6_0: you can't chain down those who know.
thag1.14:1.7_0: ... who are the most senior monk in Vanavaccha.
